comment.author: 29903115@N06
comment._content: Japanese armoured cruiser Asama (built by Armstrong) with one of the three funnel Japanese battleships(?) following.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/29903115@N06] Thank you for that information Trainiac, we think you're right! Our records have been updated.

comment.author: 66546790@N07
comment._content: This ship is really the Asama. The following cruiser is the Iwate.
